deploy.startCommand: echo '🚀 Starting migrations...' && python manage.py migrate && echo '📦 Collecting static files...' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && echo '🌐 Starting server with gunicorn on port $PORT...' && gunicorn core.asgi:application -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --log-level info
